item.title: Very uneven pavements, with pot holes and various deviations., 10th September
item.description:
This has been an ongoing problem for some years. Reported previously, no action or response. Dangerous to pedestrians, particularly to sight impaired. Trip hazard. Lucky no one has suffered serious injuries.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 140, Maple Road, Penge, London

item.title: The signs that have been put up in Fernhead Road encouraging dog owners to clean up after their dogs have been pulled down to pavement level near 115 Fernhead Road. And just after the laundrette ., 10th September
item.description:
The signs that have been put up encouraging dog owners to clean up after their dogs have been pulled down to pavement level. This is in Fernhead Road, near 115 and just after the laundrette. Perhaps these signs could be repositioned, high enough out of the reach of these inconsiderate dog owners! This is also the case in Shirland Road. As a suggestion, would it be possible for you to put dog fouling bins in Fernhead Road, Fordingley Road, Bravington Road, Denholm Road, Portnal Road, Saltram Crescent and Shirland Road? "This is only a suggestion, because some dog owners are making it their business to dump their bagged up dog fouling in residential bins. Where they don't Reside! Thank you in anticipation.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 97, Fernhead Road, Kensal Town, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Vegetation encroaching onto pathways, Cator Park Beckenham, 10th September
item.description:
Vegetation encroaching onto pathways at several locations in Cator Park Beckenham. Namely: 1. Path opposite "Bark Park" 2. Pathway/cycle route from central notice board towards Kings Hall Road exit, 3. Curved pathway from waste bin at Kings Hall Road end towards bridge over Chaffinch Brook.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Aldersmead Road, New Beckenham, London
Report on FixMyStreet
